Build version:2.2.0.v20070405-0630

The same problem occurs when preview in xls.
Fixed, The excel emitter calculates the layout during the runtime instead pre-caculate.
*** Bug 189621 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 183549 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 183169 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
